column3: Latest;*There have been several fatalities caused by electric shocks during the recent flooding
column4: including at least one child.------Stung Treng:------ On September 9
column7: an electrical accident caused the death of a man who died in a flooded room.------The victim was working as an officer in the Stung Treng Provincial Department of Planning in the village.------ On the day of the incident
column8: the victim decided to charge his phone with a power outlet in his room
column10: causing a sudden electric shock.------A funeral is now being held by the family. ------POST NEWS
